text.summary: In a May 2006 letter to Penn State Undergraduate Dean Robert Pangborn, student and wiki advocate George Chriss defends his proposal for a student-based university wiki as a complement to the University’s official course description and effective course feedback pipeline, after Penn’s decision against wiki on grounds of potential misinformation and management difficulties.
